name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Electrical Engineer with 13+ years of experience in **Electrical System Design**, **Power Distribution**, and **Load Flow Analysis**. Proven expertise in implementing **Direct Liquid Cooling** solutions and conducting **Short-Circuit Analysis** to ensure reliable and efficient power systems. Familiar with NEC/IEC Codes and adept at achieving **Tier Certification** standards. 
Demonstrates exceptional **problem-solving** abilities and strong **communication** skills, facilitating effective **collaboration** across cross-functional teams. Skilled in leveraging advanced technologies and methodologies to drive innovative solutions in engineering challenges.
